title: Convenient syntheses of 2-acylamino-4-halothiazoles and acylated derivatives using a versatile Boc-intermediate
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27894-27903
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04959D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sophie Pate, Joshua Taujanskas, Robyn Wells, Craig M. Robertson, Paul M. O'Neill, Andrew V. Stachulski
Pseudothiohydantoin was readily converted into 2-amino-4-halothiazoles in Boc-protected form. The products were readily converted into potential antiviral thiazolides.
